org.xlattice.httpd

Class SecMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.SecurityManager
      • org.xlattice.httpd.SecMgr

  •  class SecMgr
extends java.lang.SecurityManager
    A minimal security manager. XXX We probably don't need one, given that we so strictly restrict the interpretation of Strings from the outside world.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon
